item.description:
Become certified to give the gift of Reiki to friends, family, pets or clients. Reiki is east to learn and is an effective healing modality to bring peace to body, mind, spirit. You will receive a notebook and four Reiki attunements. Class covers history of Reiki, hand positions, practice sessions, ethics, how to begin a practice. Contact Judy at 781-639-1236 if you would like to join this class.
The class is being held in two parts - from 3-6 p.m. on Jan. 7 & 14. This is traditional Usui Reiki and you will be fully certified at the end of the class.
item.name: Reiki First Degree Certification Training
